column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I appreciate your suggestion that we "calm our atmosphere." We try our best to do so
column3: and sometimes mistakes by the front of house and/or back of house can compound delays
column5: we suffered some of that today. The result was an extended wait time for some of our food to reach the tables. The knock-on effect is that sometimes servers and bartenders cannot spend as much time as they normally would with each customer. Again
column7: and for the mistakes we make
